turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing a pizza order from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have four small pizzas? And I will tell you the topping for each.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, im ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Could I have a Veggie Lovers pizza, one plain cheese pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: one pepperoni pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And one sausage and onion pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, just to let you know, you can get up to 3 ingrediants for the same price per pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me read that order back to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 small pizzas, 1 veggie lovers, 1 plain cheese, 1 pepperoni, 1 sausage and onion pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. And can I have a fake crust on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any sides or drinks to your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That was all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the price will be $52.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that'd be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me see when it will be ready for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will be ready in 20 minutes, just show them your receipt and you will be good to go.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will. Thank you so much.
